title: Pilsen Condo Quality Duplex
map_address: 2009 w 21 st place near Damien and 21 st place
posting_body: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bath duplex located in the Pilsen with bonus Den/family room.
1 st floor boasts open concept living and kitchen area with 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom  with large walk in shower.
2 nd floor offers additional living space with laundry room as well as 2 nd bedroom and complete bath with soaking tub.
Both floors have decks with sitting areas and a back yard.
This unit has private front and back entrances.
Parking in a shared garage available for an additional fee   Permitted street parking also available.
Credit check, move in fee, and security deposit required.
